Title: Relates to creating provisions regarding the unlawful sale of law enforcement identification
Summary: Prohibits the sale of any badge, shield, identification card or other insignia of any police department or law enforcement agency or a facsimile of such a badge or shield; imposes a civil penalty not to exceed $250 for each violation.
LawCode: Add ยง139, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the unlawful sale of law enforcement identification
